verbose_text: T cell clones isolated from patients who responded to donor lymphocyte infusions after HLA matched allogeneic stem cell transplantation were tested against a panel of 191 EBV transformed B cells, which have been sequenced by the 1000 Genomes Project and selected for expression of seven common HLA class I alleles (HLA-A * 01:01, A * 02:01, A * 03:01, B * 07:02, B * 08:01, C * 07:01, and C * 07:02).
evidence: expression of seven common HLA class I alleles
